entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle changing to rain or periods of drizzle in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
